net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller

Class JAXBMarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy,T extends NamedType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller.JAXBMarshaller<D,T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyMarshaller<D>, ProxyUnmarshaller<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JAXBCounterExampleMarshaller, JAXBModuleMarshaller, JAXBProductDESMarshaller

    public abstract class JAXBMarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy,T extends NamedType>
extends Object
implements ProxyMarshaller<D>, ProxyUnmarshaller<D>

    A helper class to read and write XML files.

    The JAXBMarshaller is a simple wrapper that provides an easy way to convert between XML files and their corresponding object structures. The object structures obtained are called documents and all implement the DocumentProxy interface.

    This abstract base class implements the core of the wrapper functionality, but is not intended to be used directly. Instead, use one of the subclasses depending on the type of document you want to handle and register it with a DocumentManager.

    Author:
    Robi Malik
    See Also:
    DocumentManager

        public FileFilter getDefaultFileFilter()
        Description copied from interface: ProxyMarshaller
